'''Starlight Coalescence''' is a quest item found on [[Minacious Isle/2.8|Minacious Isle]] during the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event.

8 Starlight Coalescence are used to unlock two [[Luxurious Chest]]s at the top of Minacious Isle as well as a illusory staircase to the highest point of the island, which leads to a hidden area containing another Luxurious Chest.
